#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int v[1000003] = {0};
int val [1000003] = {0};
string s;
int n,k;
void func(){
	v[0]=0;
	int l,r;
	for(int i=1,l=0,r=0;i<n;++i)
		{
			if(i<=r)
			v[i]=min(v[i-l],r-i+1);
			while(i+v[i]<n&&(s[i+v[i]]==s[v[i]]))
				{
					++v[i];
				}
			if(i+v[i]-1>r)
				{
					l=i;
					r=i+v[i]-1;
				}
		}
	}
 
int main(){
   int i;
   cin>>n;
   cin>>s;
   cin>>k;
   func();
   v[0]=n;
   for(int i=0;i<=n;++i)
		{
			val[v[i]]++;
		}
	int sum=0;
	for(i=n;i>=0;i--)
		{
			sum+=val[i];
			if(sum>=k)
				{
					break;
				}
		}
	printf("%d\n",i);
	for(int j=0;j<i;j++)
		{
			cout<<s[j];
		}
 
	return 0;
}
